meanings: 군사 At ease!, Carry on!, Rest!, Stand at ease!
Noun 본의 아닌, 마음이 내키지 않는(unwilling, reluctant).
VERB a Scot word for swear
(휴식을 취하다) rest, relax, have[take] a rest, take a break, take time off, (informal) kick back
(일을) be out of work,; (휴가를 얻어서) take (a day) off; (일자리가 없어서) be unemployed, be in between jobs

examples.korean: at rest 발음듣기 쉬어. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
Stand easy! 발음듣기 쉬어! YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
Sit back and relax. 발음듣기 등을 기대고 편히 쉬어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Rest your eyes every half an hour. 발음듣기 반 시간마다 한 번씩 눈을 쉬어 주어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rest your eyes every half an hour. 발음

examples.korean: When you are in times of trouble, hit the pause button. 발음듣기 힘들 때 잠시 쉬어 봐. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
